name: Pouncer
overview:
Pouncer was the only entertainment shopping site exclusive to Australia. With bids typically under 15c - along with free auctions, bid refunds and many ways to earn free bids - it was a fun, engaging and social way to shop.

Pouncer boasted the following features:

  • Sponsored Auctions (completely free auctions provided by a sponsor)

  • Pouncer Bombs (random free auctions that award the user free bids)

  • Refund Auctions (all bids refunded after auction ends)

  • Newbie Auctions (auctions restricted to users who’ve won < 2 items)

  • Pouncer Stats (stats on the number of bidders and the auction duration)

  • uChoose Auctions (winner has choices on auction item properties)

  • Buy It Now (unsuccessful users can contribute spent bids to outright purchase)

  • End Price Predictor (users can guess the end price for free bids)

  • Post to Facebook (bids awarded for posting a win to facebook)

  • Blitz Auctions (bid limited auctions)

  • Pouncer Votes (auctions determined by majority vote)

  • Pack Multipliers (random free auctions that give a bid bonus on the user’s next pack purchase)

  • Facebook Quizzes (bid giveaways on Facebook)
